statements: UPDATE emergency_response SET team_contact='123-456-7890', team_name='Medical Team' WHERE team_id=1;
UPDATE emergency_response SET team_name='Firefighters', team_type='Fire Department' WHERE team_id=2;
UPDATE emergency_response SET team_name='First Responders', team_type='Firefighters', team_contact='911' WHERE team_id=1;
UPDATE emergency_response SET team_type='Paramedics', team_contact='999', team_name='Medical Team' WHERE team_id=2;
UPDATE MedicalTeam SET contact_number = '123-456-7890', team_name = 'Update Team Name' WHERE team_id = 101;
UPDATE SecurityTeam SET team_lead = 'Updated Lead Name', contact_number = '987-654-3210' WHERE team_id = 201;
UPDATE MedicalTeam SET team_name='Emergency Response Team', lead_doctor='Dr. Smith' WHERE team_id=1
UPDATE SecurityTeam SET team_name='Security Task Force', team_lead='Captain Johnson' WHERE team_id=2
UPDATE medical_team SET team_leader = 'John Doe', contact_number = '(123) 456-7890' WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE emergency_plan SET assigned_security_team_id = 2, description = 'Updated emergency response plan' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE medical_team SET team_leader='Dr. John Doe', email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE team_id=1;
